adjective.description: Denoting a joint in which one element rotates on its own axis (e.g. the atlas vertebra).
Denoting a curve traced by a point on a radius of a circle rotating along a straight line or another circle (a cycloid, epicycloid, or hypocycloid).
Having or denoting a form of mollusk shell which is conical with a flat base, like a top shell.

origin: Early 18th century: from Greek trokhoeidēs wheel-like, from trokhos wheel.
